src_original: dvitīyaḥ svārthānumānaparicchedaḥ /  evaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyākhyāya anumānaṃ vyākhyātum āha --
anumānaṃ dvidhā II-1  anumānaṃ dvidhā dviprakāram /
atha anumānalakṣaṇe vaktavye kim akasmāt prakārabhedaḥ kathyate /
tgt_original: nanvanirūpyānumānasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tadvibhajanamanucitam,  lakṣaṇa eva hi prathamato jijñāsā samudeti |
